commit message: Committing patch to enable ProGuard. Fixes #391. Props willnorris
Remove duplicate Base64 classes. Fixes #392. Props willnorris
Add 'size-full' class to image css so that themes can handle the images better.
Removing stats upload. We get the same (and better) data in the Google Play console now.
Import cleanup in Dashboard.java
Added Holo.Light as the parent theme for Android devices 3.0 or greater. Dialogs and UI elements look much better.

Fixes #393 by capturing image directly to camera folder in external storage, as the insertImage method wasn't working on Touchwiz.

Also fixed formatting in ImageHelper.java and bumped minimum SDK version to 8 as discussed on the dev P2.
Fixes #395. Catch general exceptions to handle fringe case errors. In this case rely on fallbacks for linking up stats with the correct blog.

Use HttpURLConnection for account setup, fixes not being able to connect over HTTPS with SNI. Refs #390. Props willnorris.

Also included some import cleanups.
Holo style for large devices.
Should fix crash in ViewPostFragment although I couldn't reproduce to find the actual cause. Fixes #395
Bumping version number and import cleanup.

Adding a few colors.xml files to fix coloring in the alert dialog for the image options. Note: We should add all colors used in the app in this file for greater flexibility if we want to change them later.
Adding back styles.xml for sw720dp devices
Set the correct UserAgent in the XML-RPC client when the app is running on BB a device.
Consolidated styles. There was a lot of duplicate style code that wasn't needed (and also causing conflicts with the styling)

Proguard was not allowing the JavaScript interface for the WordPress.com reader. Followed example at http://stackoverflow.com/questions/5356560/android-proguard-javascript-interface-problem to fix it.
Bumped the VersionCode number otherwise can't sign for AppWord.

Style updates:

* Fixed huge ToggleButton's on the post editor formatting bar
* Fixed gingerbread style dialogs from showing up when using Holo
* Changed all EditText's to use default styling (looks better for Holo)
* Removed some field labels and used the 'hint' property instead
* Updated a few strings
Updating copyright year.
